Synopsis: Converts color names or hex codes to different formats.
Description: ConvertFrom-Color function converts color names or hex codes to different formats such as decimal values or System.Drawing.Color objects.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
ConvertFrom-Color -Color Red, Blue -AsDecimal
Converts the colors Red and Blue to decimal values.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
ConvertFrom-Color -Color "#FFA500" -AsDrawingColor
Converts the color with hex code #FFA500 to a System.Drawing.Color object.
